neuralnetwork
Class NeuralNetwork

java.lang.Object
  neuralnetwork.NeuralNetwork
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class NeuralNetwork
extends Object
implements Serializable

Feed-forward neural network using the backpropagation algorithm. Inputs and outputs are vectors, whom values are doubles between 0 and 1.

Version:
$Revision: 1.0 $
Author:
Francesco De Comite (decomite at lifl.fr)
See Also:
Sample, Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

NeuralNetwork

public NeuralNetwork(int[] descriptLayers)
Initialisation.

Parameters:
descriptLayers - : array containing the size of each layer.
  • Layer 0 : inputs
  • Last layer : outputs
Don't forget to add 1 to the actual number of cells in a layer (threshold!)
